data.title: Romain Fournier: Chief Editor at MarketScreener
data.meta_description: Find the latest articles by Romain Fournier on MarketScreener. Having worked in the British, French and Swiss financial press, Romain is able to report on local and international issues, as comfortable in French a...
data.text:
ANALYST RECOMMENDATIONS : Epam Systems, Five9, T-Mobile, Lyft, Under Armour...

Every morning, find a selection of analysts' recommendations covering North America and the UK. The list only includes companies that have been the subject of a change of opinion or price target, or of a new coverage. It may be updated during the session. This information can be used to shed light on movements in certain stocks or on market sentiment towards a company.

August 09, 2024 at 05:44 am EDT

US jobs data and Hargreaves Lansdown's takeover light up FTSE 100

The FTSE 100 and other global indices enjoyed a sunny spell, buoyed by cheery economic data from the U.S. and China. The UK market had its own fireworks with Hargreaves Lansdown's takeover deal stealing the spotlight. Investors now eagerly await the upcoming inflation data from the US and the UK.

August 09, 2024 at 04:40 am EDT

Global markets live: Amazon, Intel, Boeing, Robinhood, KKR, Zillow...

Every day, the MarketScreener team selects the most important news about listed companies across the world. Here's a short recap for your convenience:

August 08, 2024 at 11:09 am EDT

Nasdaq's wild mood swings

Ah, the financial world—a place where the sky is always either falling or about to fall. Today, however, the sky is holding up just fine, thank you very much. The US labor market, our trusty economic barometer, delivered some good news.

August 08, 2024 at 09:17 am EDT

ANALYST RECOMMENDATIONS : Chevron, Fortinet, Hilton, Walt Disney, Hiscox...

Every morning, find a selection of analysts' recommendations covering North America and the UK. This information can be used to shed light on movements in certain stocks or on market sentiment towards a company.

August 08, 2024 at 06:18 am EDT

The LSE fidgets as jobs numbers lurk

The London Stock Exchange is feeling the blues as investors sift through corporate earnings and brace for crucial US economic data. Despite some standout performances from companies like Beazley and Entain, the overall market mood remains wary.

August 08, 2024 at 05:05 am EDT

Stocks in motion: Fortinet and Shopify soar on good earnings

Why is it up? Why is it down? Here's a few comments on the unusual variations affecting stocks on the NYSE today. Only when they are reliable and documented: we avoid nonsense whenever possible! Variations are taken at the time of writing.

August 07, 2024 at 11:31 am EDT

Market meltdown averted

What a difference a day (or two) make! Global stock markets took a leap on Wednesday, partly due to the Bank of Japan's (BOJ) surprise decision to play it cool with interest rate hikes. This unexpected move was like a soothing balm for jittery investors, causing the yen to take a nosedive. Monday’s correction already seems like a distant memory.

August 07, 2024 at 09:25 am EDT

ANALYST RECOMMENDATIONS : Amgen, Fortinet, Moderna, Airbnb, BP...

Every morning, find a selection of analysts' recommendations covering North America and the UK. The list only includes companies that have been the subject of a change of opinion or price target, or of a new coverage. It may be updated during the session. This information can be used to shed light on movements in certain stocks or on market sentiment towards a company.

August 07, 2024 at 08:36 am EDT

Market's Manic Monday morphs into Turnaround Tuesday

Global stock markets decided to play nice on Tuesday after throwing a tantrum on Monday. Wall Street futures were in a good mood, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average, Nasdaq Composite, and S&P 500 all set to rise between 0.6% and 0.8%. This is a welcome change from Monday's drama, where the Dow dropped 2.6%, the S&P 500 lost 3.0%, and the Nasdaq threw itself off a 3.4% cliff.

August 06, 2024 at 08:36 am EDT

ANALYST RECOMMENDATIONS : Amazon, Tesla, AMD, Kellanova, Nvidia...

Every morning, find a selection of analysts' recommendations covering North America and the UK. The list only includes companies that have been the subject of a change of opinion or price target, or of a new coverage. It may be updated during the session. This information can be used to shed light on movements in certain stocks or on market sentiment towards a company.

August 06, 2024 at 05:26 am EDT

London mends with a nudge from the Fed

London's FTSE 100 index decided to shake off its Monday blues and rose by 0.6% on Tuesday. Monday's market tumble was courtesy of some dismal U.S. manufacturing and employment data. However, a resurgence in U.S. services sector activity and reassuring comments from Federal Reserve officials helped steady the ship, alongside robust corporate earnings. Meanwhile, in Japan, the Nikkei index pulled a dramatic 180, jumping 8.7% after a 12% drop on Monday.

August 06, 2024 at 04:13 am EDT

From Boom to Doom

Ah, August in the financial markets—a month that’s shaping up to be as pleasant as a root canal. And we’re only on the 5th! Investors are acting like they’ve just discovered their favorite TV show got canceled. Dramatic, irrational, and downright chaotic moves are the order of the day. Welcome to Fifty Shades of Red.

August 05, 2024 at 09:24 am EDT
